title: Puella Magi Oriko Magica: Extra Story
alternative_title: Magical Girl Oriko★Magica: Extra Story, Puella Magi Oriko★Magica: Extra Story, Mahou Shoujo Oriko Magica - Betsu Hen, Mahou Shoujo Oriko★Magica: Betsu-hen, Mahou Shoujo Oriko Magica - Another Story, Symmetry Diamond, Noisy Citrine
status: Magical Girl Oriko★Magica: Extra Story, Puella Magi Oriko★Magica: Extra Story, Mahou Shoujo Oriko Magica - Betsu Hen, Mahou Shoujo Oriko★Magica: Betsu-hen, Mahou Shoujo Oriko Magica - Another Story, Symmetry Diamond, Noisy Citrine
description:
Description :
        Oriko's ability to see into the future led her to commit bloody acts in her efforts to forestall an even greater tragedy later on. But what if Oriko had met Yuma Chitose before she predicted the end of the world? Would she still have chosen to manipulate the young girl if Yuma had been no stranger, but a dear friend? Puella Magi Oriko Magica: Extra Story explores the might have been, and further explores Kirika's devotion to her beloved Oriko.
